      • possiblyMultipleRowsPerParent

        boolean possiblyMultipleRowsPerParent()
        is this class designed to read possibly multiple rows for a given parent row
        Returns:
        false if at most one row is read for a parent row. And there will be calls to read() and not to readForParent(); If true, user of this class initially calls getKeyValue() for a parent, and will invoke readForPrent();

      • inputARow

        boolean inputARow(List<FormattedMessage> errors,
                  ServiceContext ctx)
           throws Exception,
                  InvalidRowException
        read an input row.
        Parameters:
        errors - list to which any validation errors are added
        ctx -
        Returns:
        false means the row was not read. Either there is no row for the current parent, or EOF.
        Throws:
        InvalidRowException
        Exception

      • inputARow

        boolean inputARow(List<FormattedMessage> errors,
                  String parentKey,
                  ServiceContext ctx)
           throws Exception,
                  InvalidRowException
        read an input row for the specified parent key. This key is fetched with an earlier call to getParentKeyValue()
        Parameters:
        parentKey -
        errors - list to which any validation errors during input shuld be added
        ctx -
        Returns:
        false means the row was not read. Either there is no row for the current parent, or EOF.
        Throws:
        InvalidRowException
        Exception

      • getParentKeyValue

        String getParentKeyValue(List<FormattedMessage> errors,
                         ServiceContext ctx)
        get parent key value as designed by this object.
        Parameters:
        errors - list to which any validation errors during input should be added
        ctx -
        Returns:
        String, possibly concatenated as values of individual key parent key fields.

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Returns:
        actual name of input file, if relevant. null if there is no such file
